meanings.sent1: The strong pillars underpin the entire building.
meanings.sent2: A good education underpins a successful career.
meanings.sent3: The roots of the tree underpin its growth and stability.
meanings.sent5: The love and support of family underpins everything I do.

meanings.sent1: The solid concrete base underpins the structure of the house.
meanings.sent2: Clear communication underpins a strong team.
meanings.sent3: Laughter underpins their friendship, making every moment joyful.
meanings.sent4: Honesty underpins the integrity of his character.
meanings.sent5: Hard work underpins her path to success.
